original_title: Düsseldorf - Modisch, Heiter, im Winde verspielt
overview: After a shoot, Ina Balke - who was a model at the time in Paris - strolls through the city's boutiques, galleries and hotels. At the same time, a spokesman announces Düsseldorf history and we see well-respected sights.
title: Düsseldorf - Modisch, Heiter, im Winde verspielt
